properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Walk in the light And thou shalt know That fellowship of love His spirit only can bestow Who reigns in light above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Walk in the light And thou shalt find Thy heart made truly His Who dwells in cloudless Light enshrined In whom no darkness is{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Walk in the light And sin abhorred Shall ne'er defile again The blood of Jesus Christ the Lord Shall cleanse from every stain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Walk in the light And e'en the tomb No fearful shade shall wear The glory shall dispel the gloom For Christ hath conquered there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Walk in the light And thou shalt own Thy darkness passed away Because that light Hath on thee shone In which is perfect day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Walk in the light Thy path shall be Peaceful serene and bright For God by grace shall dwell in thee And God Himself is Light{/lang-eng}
